short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping you with the heavylifting of bonded investment property calculations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nimblr does the heavylifting work for property investment calculations on bond.

The calculator considers frequently hidden costs such as transfer and registration costs, rates & levies, maintenance, insurance and management fees to give you a more accurate, and more realistic outlook on how your property investment would work in South Africa.

* Get the figures that matter
✓ View your monthly cash flow
✓ View your year 1 annual return
✓ View your year 2 annual return and return on investment

* Take the hidden costs into consideration
✓ Adjust your deposit, interest rate, loan term, rates, levies, capital appreciation and more

* Supported on major SA property sites
✓ View bonded investment property calculations for Property24 and PrivateProperty
